tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (NP (QP (RB only) (DT a) (JJ few))) (NP (JJR more) (NNS hours))) (CC and) (NP (NP (RB then)) (VP (VBG sleeping) (NP (DT the) (NN day)) (ADVP (RB away)))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [few/JJ advmod>only/RB advmod>a/DT dep>[hours/NNS amod>more/JJR] cc>and/CC conj:and>[then/RB acl>[sleeping/VBG nmod:tmod>[day/NN det>the/DT] advmod>away/RB]]]
